title: Multiple connections
fullText:
Where facilities for the connection of more than one supply lead to the connectable electrical installation are provided, the installation shall be arranged such that there are no interconnections between the live (active and neutral) conductors of different supplies or between the pins of different inlets.
For multiple connection earthing requirements, see the following clauses for the applicable requirements:
(a) Clause 3.9 for relocatable structures.
(b) Clause 4.11 for recreational vehicles and non-recreational vehicles.
